participant_1.background:
I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!

participant_2.background:
I like my friends and my pets the most.
I'm a 35 year old male police officer who collects interesting things I find on my couch.
I had to say goodbye to my mother when she passed away.
I listen to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment.
i eat large meals.

content.text: Hey! I'm so glad to meet you! I love pets and music too! What's your favorite kind of music?
Hi! I love listening to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment. What about you?
I love music that makes me feel nostalgic, like I'm back in high school. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Oreo and a dog named Bailey. What about you?
I have two cats named Mittens and Snowball!
Oh, I love cats! They're so cute and cuddly.
Yeah, they're the best! What's your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I like to stay in and watch movies with my pets. What do you like to do?
I like to stay in and cuddle with my cats! I also like to go for runs on rainy days to clear my head.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a runner, but I love to go for walks in the rain.
I love walking in the rain too! It's so refreshing.
Yeah, it really is. It's a great way to clear your head and relax.
I agree! I'm glad we're both such big fans of pets and music.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
I know, right? It's so much fun to talk about things you love with someone who understands.
Me too! Let's chat again soon!
